attributes.additional_details:
Her conduct id a disgrace and I do not believe a word of what she says.
Maria Miller has brought disrepute to the Government and if she does not resign of her own free will she should be removed from a Position in the cabinet by the Prim Mister NOW.
If this is not done I will Not be Voting Conservative at the next Election
Michael Chivers

24 PO4 0QL

rejection.details: Expenses are a matter for the Parliamentary authorities.
